00013     template<class GridImp>
00014     class FoamGridLevelIndexSet :
00015         public IndexSet<GridImp,FoamGridLevelIndexSet<GridImp> >
00016     {
00017 
00019         enum {dim = GridImp::dimension};
00020 
00022         enum {dimworld = GridImp::dimensionworld};
00023 
00024     public:
00025         
00027         template<int codim>
00028         int index (const typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<codim>::Entity& e) const
00029         {
00030             return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).target_->levelIndex_;
00031         }
00032         
00034         template<int cc>
00035         int subIndex (const typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<cc>::Entity& e, 
00036                       int i,
00037                       unsigned int codim) const
00038         {
00039             if( cc == 0 )
00040                 return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).subLevelIndex(i,codim);
00041             else {
00042                 DUNE_THROW(Dune::NotImplemented, "!");
00043                 //return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).levelIndex(); 
00044             }
00045         }
00046 
00048         int size (int codim) const {
00049             switch (codim) {
00050             case 0:
00051                 return numTriangles_ + numQuads_;
00052             case 1:
00053                 return numEdges_;
00054             case 2:
00055                 return numVertices_;
00056             }
00057              
00058             return 0;
00059         }
00060         
00061         
00063         int size (GeometryType type) const
00064         {
00065             if (type.isVertex())
00066                 return numVertices_;
00067             if (type.isLine())
00068                 return numEdges_;
00069             if (type.isTriangle())
00070                 return numTriangles_;
00071             if (type.isQuadrilateral())
00072                 return numQuads_;
00073             return 0;
00074         }
00075         
00076         
00078         const std::vector<GeometryType>& geomTypes (int codim) const
00079         {
00080             return myTypes_[codim];
00081         }
00082 
00087         template<class EntityType>
00088         bool contains (const EntityType& e) const
00089         {
00090             return level_ == e.level();
00091         }
00092         
00094         void update(const GridImp& grid, int level)
00095         {
00096             level_ = level;
00097 
00098             // ///////////////////////////////
00099             //   Init the element indices
00100             // ///////////////////////////////
00101             numTriangles_ = 0;
00102             numQuads_ = 0;
00103             typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<2,dimworld> >::const_iterator eIt;
00104             for (eIt =  Dune::get<dim>(grid.entityImps_[level_]).begin(); 
00105                  eIt != Dune::get<dim>(grid.entityImps_[level_]).end(); 
00106                  ++eIt)
00108                 *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(eIt->levelIndex_)) = (eIt->type().isTriangle()) ? numTriangles_++ : numQuads_++;
00109             
00110             // ///////////////////////////////
00111             //   Init the element indices
00112             // ///////////////////////////////
00113             numEdges_ = 0;
00114             typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld> >::const_iterator edIt;
00115             for (edIt =  Dune::get<1>(grid.entityImps_[level_]).begin(); 
00116                  edIt != Dune::get<1>(grid.entityImps_[level_]).end(); 
00117                  ++edIt)
00119                  *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(edIt->levelIndex_)) = numEdges_++;
00120             
00121             // //////////////////////////////
00122             //   Init the vertex indices
00123             // //////////////////////////////
00124             
00125             numVertices_ = 0;
00126             typename std::list<FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld> >::const_iterator vIt;
00127             for (vIt =  Dune::get<0>(grid.entityImps_[level_]).begin(); 
00128                  vIt != Dune::get<0>(grid.entityImps_[level_]).end(); 
00129                  ++vIt)
00131                 *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(vIt->levelIndex_)) = numVertices_++;
00132             
00133             // ///////////////////////////////////////////////
00134             //   Update the list of geometry types present
00135             // ///////////////////////////////////////////////
00136             for (int i=0; i<=dim; i++)
00137                 myTypes_[i].resize(0);
00138 
00139             if (numTriangles_>0)
00140                 myTypes_[0].push_back(GeometryType(GeometryType::simplex,2));
00141 
00142             if (numQuads_>0)
00143                 myTypes_[0].push_back(GeometryType(GeometryType::cube,2));
00144 
00145             if (numEdges_>0)
00146                 myTypes_[1].push_back(GeometryType(1));
00147 
00148             if (numVertices_>0)
00149                 myTypes_[dim].push_back(GeometryType(0));
00150             
00151         }
00152         
00153         int level_;
00154 
00155         int numQuads_;
00156 
00157         int numTriangles_;
00158 
00159         int numEdges_;
00160 
00161         int numVertices_;
00162 
00164         std::vector<GeometryType> myTypes_[dim+1];
00165     };

00168 template<class GridImp>
00169 class FoamGridLeafIndexSet :
00170     public IndexSet<GridImp,FoamGridLeafIndexSet<GridImp> >
00171 {
00172 
00173     // Grid dimension
00174     enum {dim      = remove_const<GridImp>::type::dimension};
00175     
00176     // Grid dimension
00177     enum {dimworld = remove_const<GridImp>::type::dimensionworld};
00178     
00179 public:
00180     
00182         /*
00183             We use the RemoveConst to extract the Type from the mutable class,
00184             because the const class is not instantiated yet.
00185         */
00186         template<int codim>
00187         int index (const typename remove_const<GridImp>::type::template Codim<codim>::Entity& e) const
00188         {
00189             return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).target_->leafIndex_; 
00190         }
00191         
00193         template<int cc>
00194         int subIndex (const typename remove_const<GridImp>::type::Traits::template Codim<cc>::Entity& e, 
00195                       int i,
00196                       unsigned int codim) const
00197         {
00198             if( cc == 0 )
00199                 return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).subLeafIndex(i,codim);
00200             else {
00201                 DUNE_THROW(Dune::NotImplemented, "!");
00202                 //return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).leafIndex(); 
00203             }
00204         }
00205 
00207     int size (GeometryType type) const
00208     {
00209         return (type.dim() < 0 || type.dim() > dim) ? 0 : size_[type.dim()];
00210     }
00211         
00212         
00214         int size (int codim) const
00215         {
00216             return (codim < 0 || codim > dim) ? 0 : size_[dim - codim];
00217         }
00218         
00219         
00221         const std::vector<GeometryType>& geomTypes (int codim) const
00222         {
00223             return myTypes_[codim];
00224         }
00225 
00227     template<class EntityType>
00228     bool contains (const EntityType& e) const
00229     {
00230         return GridImp::getRealImplementation(e).target_->isLeaf();
00231     }
00232 
00233 
00234         
00236     void update(const GridImp& grid)
00237     {
00238 
00239         dune_static_assert(dim==2, "LeafIndexSet::update() only works for 2d grids");
00240 
00241         // ///////////////////////////////
00242         //   Init the element indices
00243         // ///////////////////////////////
00244         size_[dim] = 0;
00245         typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<0>::LeafIterator eIt    = grid.template leafbegin<0>();
00246         typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<0>::LeafIterator eEndIt = grid.template leafend<0>();
00247         
00248         for (; eIt!=eEndIt; ++eIt)
00249             *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(GridImp::getRealImplementation(*eIt).target_->leafIndex_)) = size_[dim]++;
00250 
00251         // //////////////////////////////
00252         //   Init the edge indices
00253         // //////////////////////////////
00254         
00255         size_[1] = 0;
00256         
00257         for (int i=grid.maxLevel(); i>=0; i--) {
00258 
00259             typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<1>::LevelIterator edIt    = grid.template lbegin<1>(i);
00260             typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<1>::LevelIterator edEndIt = grid.template lend<1>(i);
00261         
00262             for (; edIt!=edEndIt; ++edIt) {
00263                 
00264                 const FoamGridEntityImp<1,dimworld>* target = GridImp::getRealImplementation(*edIt).target_;
00265 
00266                 // Only implemented for 1-level grids
00267                 assert(target->isLeaf());
00268                 //if (target->isLeaf())
00269                     *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(target->leafIndex_)) = size_[1]++;
00270 //                 else
00271 //                     *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(target->leafIndex_)) = target->son_->leafIndex_;
00272 
00273             }
00274 
00275         }
00276 
00277         // //////////////////////////////
00278         //   Init the vertex indices
00279         // //////////////////////////////
00280         
00281         size_[0] = 0;
00282         
00283         for (int i=grid.maxLevel(); i>=0; i--) {
00284 
00285             typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<dim>::LevelIterator vIt    = grid.template lbegin<dim>(i);
00286             typename GridImp::Traits::template Codim<dim>::LevelIterator vEndIt = grid.template lend<dim>(i);
00287         
00288             for (; vIt!=vEndIt; ++vIt) {
00289                 
00290                 const FoamGridEntityImp<0,dimworld>* target = GridImp::getRealImplementation(*vIt).target_;
00291 
00292                 if (target->isLeaf())
00293                     *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(target->leafIndex_)) = size_[0]++;
00294                 else
00295                     *const_cast<unsigned int*>(&(target->leafIndex_)) = target->son_->leafIndex_;
00296 
00297             }
00298 
00299         }
00300 
00301         // ///////////////////////////////////////////////
00302         //   Update the list of geometry types present
00303         // ///////////////////////////////////////////////
00304 
00306         for (int i=0; i<=dim; i++) {
00307 
00308             if (size_[dim-i]>0) {
00309                 myTypes_[i].resize(1);
00310                 myTypes_[i][0] = GeometryType(GeometryType::simplex, dim-i);
00311             } else
00312                 myTypes_[i].resize(0);
00313 
00314         }
00315 
00316     }
00317         
00318     // Number of entities per dimension
00319     int size_[dim+1];
00320 
00322     std::vector<GeometryType> myTypes_[dim+1];
00323 
00324 };
